name: Coffee Shop Simulator (DevinFM)
description:
PLEASE READ (like, in general, but specifically what's below)

  • Ifyou're playing alone, you're gonna be real bored. The coffee shop is made to hold 20 people at a time, so get some friends to play with you.
  • Play it full-screen.
  • Move with WASD or the arrow keys.

KNOWN ISSUES

  • There are no sounds as of yet.
  • The scores don't report correctly. Working on it, but I'm really stupid.
  • Entering a coffee shop that's already populated doesn't show who has and doesn't have coffee unless they grab it while you're in the room.

THINGS BEING ADDED

  • Sound lol
  • Instructions on how to play
  • Dialogue with the barista
